Introduction

This program is a small sample based on th wxWidgets Minimal sample for describing the wxRubberBand Class. The wxRubberBand Classs allow interactive selection of an image part.User will found wxRubberBand class documentation in this document.

Figure 1 : Show the interface of wxRubberBand under Linux (Ubuntu 6.10, wxGTK 2.7.1)

Reference

Some other usefull links could be found there :

wxCode, a code and component depot for wxWidgets (http://www.wxcode.org)
